definitions.title: n. coll. f.
definitions.body: :Ge 30:36 (poss. m. v:Ge 30:39 a +, Kö:Synt. § 247 g, but dub., v:Ge 30:39 b c. vb. fpl., as usually; in 1Sa 15:14 join [[הַוָּה]] with [[קוֹל]]; v. further Albr:ZAW xv (1895), 316 ff.) small cattle, sheep and goats, flock, flocks;—´[[ח]] abs. Ge 4:2 + ; cstr. Ge 29:9 + ; sf. [[חאׂנוֹ]] Ge 4:4 +; [[חאׂנֵנוּ]] Ex 10:9, [[חאׂונֵוּ]] Ps 144:13; as pl. [[חאׂנוֹ]] Ne 10:37 van d. H. Gi (not Baer; very late, si vera l.), etc.;—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: small cattle, usu. of sheep and goats in one flock (Rob:BR i. 477) Ge 30:31, Ge 30:32 + ; sheep specified also Ge 21:28 (´[[כִּבְשׂת הַצּ]]), Ge 31:28 (´[[אֵילֵי ח]]) +; sheep only 1Sa 25:2 (+ [[עִוּים]]); goats specified Ge 27:9, Je 50:8; ´[[ח]] as yielding (1) animals for food Am 6:4 ([[בָּרִים]]), 1Sa 14:32, 2Sa 12:4, Ne 5:l8 + ; [[מַאְַבָל]] ´[[ח]] Ps 44:12 (in sim.); (2) wool Ge 31:19 + (v. [[[נָּזַז]]], [[נֵּז]]); (3) milk, ´[[חְַלֵב ח]] De 32:14 (? goatsrs milk, cf. Pr 27:27); (4) sacrif. victims Ge 4:4 (J), Le 1:2, Le 1:10, Le 3:6, Nu 15:3 (all P), Nu 22:40 (E), De 12:6, De 12:17, De 12:21 + oft.; so [[חזׂן וְחאׂן קָדָשִׁיט]] Ez Eze 36:38 a, cf. [[בְקָרֵינוּ וְחאׂנֵינוּ בְּכוֹרֵי]] Ne 10:37; in gen. as property (oft. + [[בָּקָר]], etc.) Ge 12:16, Ge 13:5, Ge 24:35, Job 1:3, Job 42:12 + oft. (v. also II. [[[עֵשְׁתָּרוֹת]]]); gift Ge 20:14, Ge 21:27, Ge 38:17 (goat), De 15:14, 2Ch 17:11; booty 1Sa 15:9, 1Sa 15:15 + .

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: ´[[ח]] sts. of a definite number of animals (i.e. as pl. of [[שֶׂה]], etc.): two Is 7:21, four Ex 21:37 (larger numbers v. 1Sa 25:2, 1Sa 25:5, 1Sa 25:18, Nu 31:32, Nu 31:36, Ne 5:18, Job 1:3, Job 42:12 supr.).—Vid. also [[בֵּן]]

sim. of multitude Ez Eze 36:37, Eze 36:38, cf. Ps 107:41; of children Job 21:11; of dead, with death as shepherd Ps 49:15; of (shepherdless) Isr. Nu 27:17, 1Ki 22:17 = 2Ch 18:16, Zec 10:2, Zec 13:7, wandering in sin Is 53:6; of Isr. led by ´[[י]] Ps 77:21, Ps 78:52, Ps 80:2, cf. Zec 9:16 (on text v. We Now); Ez Eze 34:12; of Isr. in distress, [[טִבְחָת]] ´[[כְּח]] Ps 44:23, cf. (of wicked) [[לְטִבְתָה]] Je 12:3; of scattered Bab. Is 13:14.
